title: The Face
description: Orphaned and severely deformed, from her earliest moments Sarah Sims has been kept hidden away in a secret CIA facilityâ€”until an unexpected discovery gives her an opportunity to make a life for herself at last.Now Sarah has an ally, a long-lost aunt who has discovered her true identity. Aided by this brave psychologist, twenty-year-old Sarah must find the courage to confront the forces that have confined her for so long. And the strength to be reborn into a world she has never known.
author: Angela Elwell Hunt
